sourcesContent:
<template>
<b-card  no-body class="border-0 rounded-0  vh-100 overflow-auto">
  <b-card-header header-bg-variant="light"  class="border-right rounded-0">
      Nav Head
  </b-card-header>
  <b-card-body class="border-right">
    <b-row class="mt-3 mb-2 ">
      <b-col cols="5">
        <b-button block v-b-toggle.service-list variant="primary">
          Services
        </b-button>
      </b-col>
      <b-col cols="3">
        <b-button pill variant="outline-success"
        @click="addService">
        <b-icon icon="pencil-square" aria-hidden="true"></b-icon>
        </b-button>
      </b-col>
      <b-col cols="3">
        <b-form-input  :type="text"
        v-model="serviceSearch" placeholder="*"/>
      </b-col>
    </b-row>
    <b-collapse id="service-list">
      <b-list-group flush>
        <b-list-group-item
          v-for="s in filteredServices" :key="s.name" href="#">
          <b-row>
            <b-col cols="2"/>
            <b-col cols="7">{{s.name }}</b-col>
            <b-col cols="3">
              <b-button cols="4" class="h-75 mb-2" pill variant="outline-danger" size="sm"
                    @click="removeService(s.name)">
                    <b-icon icon="trash" aria-hidden="true"></b-icon>
              </b-button>
            </b-col>
          </b-row>
        </b-list-group-item>
      </b-list-group>
    </b-collapse>

    <b-row class="mt-3 mb-2">
      <b-col cols="5">
        <b-button  block v-b-toggle.function-list variant="primary">
          Functions
        </b-button>
      </b-col>
      <b-col cols="3">
        <b-button pill variant="outline-success"
        @click="addService">
        <b-icon icon="pencil-square" aria-hidden="true"></b-icon>
        </b-button>
      </b-col>
      <b-col cols="3">
        <b-form-input  :type="text"
        v-model="functionSearch" placeholder="*"/>
      </b-col>
    </b-row>
    <b-collapse id="function-list">
      <b-list-group flush>
        <b-list-group-item v-for="s in filteredFunctions" :key="s.name" href="#">
          <b-row>
            <b-col cols="2"/>
            <b-col cols="7">{{s.name }}</b-col>
            <b-col cols="3">
              <b-button cols="4" class="h-75 mb-2" pill variant="outline-danger" size="sm"
                    @click="removeService(s.name)">
                    <b-icon icon="trash" aria-hidden="true"></b-icon>
              </b-button>
            </b-col>
          </b-row>
        </b-list-group-item>
      </b-list-group>
    </b-collapse>
  </b-card-body>
</b-card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'PolicyStore',
  data() {
    return {
      expanded: false,
      serviceSearch: '',
      functionSearch: '',
      services: [],
      services1: [
        {
          name: 'sssssss1',
        },
        {
          name: 's2',
        },
        {
          name: 's3',
        },
        {
          name: 's4',
        },
        {
          name: 's5',
        },
        {
          name: 'sssssss1',
        },
        {
          name: 's2',
        },
        {
          name: 's3',
        },
        {
          name: 's4',
        },
        {
          name: 's5',
        },
      ],
      functions: [
        {
          name: 'f1',
        },
        {
          name: 'f2',
        },
        {
          name: 'f3',
        },
        {
          name: 'f4',
        },
        {
          name: 'f5',
        },
      ],
    };
  },
  computed: {    
    filteredServices() {
      return this.services.filter(
        (service) => service.name.toLowerCase().includes(this.serviceSearch.toLowerCase()),
      );
    },
    filteredFunctions() {
      return this.functions.filter(
        (f) => f.name.toLowerCase().includes(this.functionSearch.toLowerCase()),
      );
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.axios.get('http://localhost:6733/policy-mgmt/v1/service').then((response) => {
      // console.log(response.data);
      this.services = response.data;
    });
  },
};
</script>
